class_description:
This class provides the functionality of a key agreement (or key
 exchange) protocol. The keys involved in establishing a shared secret are created by one of the
 key generators (KeyPairGenerator or
 KeyGenerator), a KeyFactory, or as a result from
 an intermediate phase of the key agreement protocol. For each of the correspondents in the key exchange, doPhase
 needs to be called. For example, if this key exchange is with one other
 party, doPhase needs to be called once, with the
 lastPhase flag set to true.
 If this key exchange is
 with two other parties, doPhase needs to be called twice,
 the first time setting the lastPhase flag to
 false, and the second time setting it to true.
 There may be any number of parties involved in a key exchange. Android provides the following KeyAgreement algorithms:
